title: What is the reason of the downfall of Yahoo? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is the reason of the downfall of Yahoo? There is no single reason for the downfall instead the downfall of Yahoo is cause by many reasons . Below are the reasons. 1.Late to the mobile. Before Marissa Mayer appoint as the ceo of yahoo, Yahoo discussion of entering the mobile was much less than Google. Thus Google have an advantage over Yahoo which may cause the downfall due to mobile advertising market lose to Google. 2.Missed chances to buy Google and Facebook Yahoo reject Larry page and Sergey Brin backrub project for 1 million.Due to the rejection,the backrub project became Google which was a trillion dollar company.Yahoo also miss the chance to buy Social media giant Facebook . These missed chances will have change Yahoo future had Yahoo accept them. 3.Identity crisis Yahoo had no specialization in any field that when people say Yahoo they will think of something. For example: Google search engine Ebay auction Microsoft windows Thus , Yahoo do not know what it want to be and therefore lead to Yahoo status as a media company and a technology company. 4.Useless Acquisitions Yahoo have 100s over acquisitions and none of them was able to turn Yahoo around.For example Yahoo brought Broadcast . com from mark cuban only to have it shut down at 2002.
